title.text: Country, Regional and World GDP (Gross Domestic Product)
Country, Regional and World GDP (Gross Domestic Product)

description.text: Country, regional and world GDP in current US Dollars ($). Regional means collections of countries e.g. Europe & Central Asia. Data is sourced from the World Bank and turned into a standard normalized CSV.

title.text: Registered death by casues of death and provinces
فوت‌های ثبت‌شده بر حسب علت فوت به تفکیک استانی

description.text: این مجموعه داده از جدول شماره ۱۱ در صفحه ۲۳۴ و ۲۳۵ از سالنامه آمارهای جمعیتی سازمان ثبت احوال کشور ۱۳۹۳ استخراج شده است.

title.text: Dataset of books from Iran Book House
Dataset of books from Iran Book House

description.text: Over 880,000 books extracted from the Iran Book House website. The Iran Book House maintains a database of all the published books that get sent to the National Library.
Over 880,000 books extracted from the Iran Book House website. The Iran Book House maintains a database of all the published books that get sent to the National Library.
